name: Squirrel Slayer3D
description:
Giant Squirrels have invaded, and it just so happened to be "Bring Your Gun To Work Day"

Controls:

WASD to move (standard fps)

Space to jump.

R to restart level

Left click to shoot

Credits: 

Manager (Voice Acting): Aman Singh

Programming: Flynn Mattson

Art/Design: Tucker Grindstaff

Music: Roe Rocket

NOTE: Anti-aliasing seems to have negative effects on Squirrel Slayer3D and must be set to Controlled By Program. However, a graphics card is recommended.
